page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING. Much of the housing in our survey area dates from the 1850's and mainly consists of terraced cottages.Although there has been a great deal of new housing built since the war,it has been concentrated in certain areas especially in the Cwmbach area. G. Hosgood (Council Chief Exec.) said that 3 out of 4 houses in the valley were either unfit to live in or in a state of serious disrepair. One of the worst areas in the valley is lower Aberaman, an old ironworks village.The village was built in blocks with little scope to extend the properties.Many of the houses have now become derelict but some new houses have been built in an effort to retain the community.
